sys_element_mapping.value: ping -qc 1 {{fd_transform:a0b716df-cace-4d76-82e5-2c978894fe7e}} > /dev/null 2>&1; RC=$?; if [ $RC -eq 0 ]; then echo "Alive"; else echo "Dead"; fi
